name: Spite
ability: Ruin 2 random cards from a rival's Hand

name: Vengeance
ability: Ruin a rival's exposed Deed

name: Crisis
ability: The rival of your choice ruins 1 of their Deeds

name: Hell's Heart
ability: Ruin the top 2 cards of a rival's Future Life

name: Roulette
ability: Ruin up to 2 cards in your Hand. You may draw up to that many cards plus 1 from the Well

name: Dwindle
ability: The player of your choice ruins a card from their Hand.

name: Panic
ability: Ruin the top card of any player's Deck. You may then play another card

name: Journey
ability: Draw 3 cards from the Well. You may then play another card

name: Jubilee
ability: Move up to 2 cards from your hand onto your Deeds

name: Longevity
ability: Deal 2 cards from the Well onto any player's Deck

name: Salvage
ability: Take 1 of the top 3 cards from the Ruins into your Hand

name: Sowing
ability: Draw 2 cards from the Well, then place 2 cards from your Hand on your Future Life

name: Another Day
ability: Draw a card from the Well. You may then play another card

name: Recycle
ability: Move 1 of the top 3 Ruins onto your Future Life

name: Swindle
ability: Look at 3 random cards from a rival's Hand; take 1 into your Hand

name: Thievery
ability: Take a rival's exposed Deed into your Hand

name: Denial
ability: Ruin a card from your Hand. Play a copy of that card's ability

name: Destiny
ability: Look at the top 3 cards of the Well; place up to 2 on your Future Life. Replace the rest, in any order

name: Stolen Dreams
ability: Move the top card of a rival's Future Life onto your Future Life

name: Peek
ability: Look at a rival's Hand. You may then play another card

name: Transmigrate
ability: Take any card from your Future Life into your Hand

name: Embody
ability: Choose 1 of your Deeds. Play a copy of that Deed's ability

name: Mimic
ability: Choose any rival's exposed Deed. Play a copy of that Deed's ability
